## App.defaultPath property

Allow to define the default path a user should be directed to when navigating to the app. When defined, this value will be used as a default for the `path` option when calling [navigateToApp](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.applicationstart.navigatetoapp.md)<!-- -->\`<!-- -->, and will also be appended to the [application navLink](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.chromenavlink.md) in the navigation bar.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
defaultPath?: string;
```
